messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression ' Answer: [A-Za-z ]+ '

Imagine a flower county with twelve flower fields. From the entrance you have two choices, the rose field and the sunflower field. You enter the rose field, at the end there's a door that leads to the tulip field, and the tulip field leads to the orchid field. There is a door in the orchid field that leads to the lily field and the lily field leads to the daffodil field. From the daffodil field you can enter the carnation field. When you visit the carnation field, you get 10 carnation flowers for free, but you do not take any flowers, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time in the entrance you choose the sunflower field, then enter the daisy field, which leads to the hydrangea field. There is a door in the hydrangea field that leads to the peony field and the peony field leads to the chrysanthemum field. At the end there is a door that leads to the marigold field. You get 50 marigold flowers for free when visiting the marigold field, but you do not take any flowers, you're just learning about the environment. You return to the entrance. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the maximum number of flowers.  Starting from the entrance, which path will lead to the maximum number of flowers?  Please list all the flower names in order, separated by commas

Please, allow me to clarify that for you, I will now present you the list of available choices, with the respective numbers associated with each one as written on this note - Please let me know what would you like to do next to proceed?
(Entrance - Rose Field - Tulip Field - Orchid Field-Lily Field- Daffodil -Carniation - Hydrangea - Chrysanthemun).
With pleasure I will assist you if desired and I would help directing you in how many available blooms, could expect in choosing each course option and let us make one of mentioned destinations as the next choice to progress on, kindly advice?
As described previously you can only take note of how many flowers await at each juncture, yet please also mind my notice prior choosing each field as at some paths free pick up would become an option which will add up when calculating later- just to give you remind the total?
Is my break- over, would 'choosen route X or' would You like go over what is this all  about or would you like choose destination by number now?".
From the rose field what is the shortest path to the carnation field? Starting from the rose field, please list the flower names in order, including rose, separated by commas.

Of course, by choosing to adventure right upon setting at your departure point from Rose Field into these subsequent enclosures; based on available information this is your course itinerary Tulip. This Tulip Area takes one direct door straight into orchard where await Orchid & Lily upon entry and by walking down into these subsequent petunal lads here are doors each, for what flowers await at their terminations  one heads North into enchanted area with Peony which takes to follow Hydrangya into field where more choices are on our menu with the sweet blooms of daffodil so that is straight into Maragold before reaching back original Rose entry point, yet by considering options now I must remind you at end of visit to every stop free blooms becomes collected, by choice?  Once again these are available here from starting gate Tulip all the orchids to their end Hydrangea that opens the garden to next path Peony, Lily into our Daffodil at finish so upon taking the choice for short route Rose- Tulip that becomes Tulip- peory with choice but then Orrange comes forth and peas all ready and bright into Maragold with a last gift upon way back here and free entry in Rose! Now your first choice and ready, do wish enjoy this enchantment journey as guide?"

expected_answer: Answer: rose, tulip, orchid, lily, daffodil, carnation
